✯ Mike's Site

Whoops

Aug 8, 2022

When moving site hosts to save a buck I seem to have screwed some things up. I'm not interested in paying for a new Kirby license so I'm trying a static site generator (Eleventy). Unfortunately, as much as I was able to do some bulk text conversion, I'm just not an expert at that stuff. For everything I love about Kirby, it unfortunately does not store all the page data in frontmatter like almost every other CMS or site generator. So it's been a bit of a pain.

The upshot: even compared to Kirby or Grav or whatever, this thing should be fast.
